for PLUGIN_DIR in "$BASE_DIR"/*/; do
  MANIFEST_FILE="${PLUGIN_DIR}manifest.json"
  if [ -f "$MANIFEST_FILE" ]; then
    if grep -q '"isDesktopOnly":' "$MANIFEST_FILE"; then
      sed -i '' 's/"isDesktopOnly": *false/"isDesktopOnly": true/' "$MANIFEST_FILE"
    else
      sed -i '' 's/}/,"isDesktopOnly": true}/' "$MANIFEST_FILE"
    fi
  fi
done","attachmentsByRange":{"{12,
